Headline: #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park and #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute at 55th/Ellis
ShortDescription: 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park &172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temp. rrtd. via 55th, Cottage Grove, 60th, and Ellis due to street blockage at 55th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park and #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Cottage Grove, 60th, and Ellis due to street blockage at 55th/Ellis.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Division
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/Harvard
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted WB: 69th, Lafayette, 71st, Wentworth and 69th; EB: 69th, Lafayette, 71st, State and 69th due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 69th/Harvard due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 69th, Lafayette, 71st, Wentworth and 69th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, Lafayette, 71st, State and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Belmont and Fullerton
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Fullerton and the Loop at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Kimball and Fullerton  to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
